snippet.title: Mega Man Battle Network 3 (Game Boy Advance) - E3 2003 Trailer (DVD Rip) 4K60 Upscale
snippet.description:
This is a 4K60 (not AI) upscale of the 720x480 .mkv interlaced DVD rip of the E3 2003 trailer for Mega Man Battle Network 3 for Game Boy Advance.

Again I used the dgbob function in Avidemux to deinterlace the video and restore it to 60fps.

This is from the DVD "The Future Of Video Games 2K4 Gamecube ( 2003)
" by Nextgenvideos.com, uploaded to archive.org by Graveurexterne:

https://archive.org/details/the-future-of-video-games-2-k-4-gamecube-2003

I used MakeMKV to rip the DVD in perfect-quality, then used MKVToolNix to split the trailers up into their own videos, as each trailer is separated by chapters which is how MKVToolNix knows where to split them. Wonder Fox has a very easy guide on how to use MKVToolNix if you need it.

MakeMKV:

https://www.makemkv.com/

MKVToolNix:

https://mkvtoolnix.download/downloads.html

Wonder Fox guide for MKVToolNix:

https://www.videoconverterfactory.com/tips/split-mkv-by-chapter.html
